column3: Latest;Sihanoukville:------ According reports from the coast
column4: rain is continuing to fall on Sihanoukville. The water at Kbal Chhay Dam has overflowed
column5: taking out electricity and caused the entire water supply in Sihanoukville.------The team is looking for ways to repair the damage.------Meanwhile the SEZ in Prey Nub is in danger of being flooded
column6: and water has forced traffic on National Road 4 to reduce to one lane around KM 175. The road is possibly going to be completely closed to all traffic later (Edit: it appears to have been ------closed now------).------Armed forces
column7: including the navy and Gendarmerie are actively rescuing people at risk from the rising waters.
